`` elias boudinot robert morris sir. philadelphia 21st novm 1783 1782 lately informed mr. hanson spoke mr. way coach conversing subject informed made crane neck finished properly must 500£ would without delay -- days afterwards information brought elegant coach town sold much cheaper new one could sent mr. way prevailed go examine return acknowledged one make used times exceeded anything could make want materials actually cost 500£. consenting mr. hanson made application purchaser agreed 300£. including new sett harness putting publick arms -- also agreed pair horses wine family maderia claret -- payments made 20 days thought best give early notice may called unexpectedly money whole 600£. old coach advertised sale perhaps would bring 150£. crane neck. got silver treasurer con- november 21 1782 sisting knives forks spoons amount near 100 oz means suit purpose except desert spoons large teaspoons three. doz large spoons neither tea pott coffee pott house think best exchanged sold necessary pieces plate. 1 c. e. boudinot. ms found reprinted boudinot life letters 1:272-73. 1 response morris letter found president 's steward richard phillips drew warrant 1,600 continental treasurer november 28 `` purchase coach harness compleat one pair horses one pipe madeira wine two hogsheads claret use said presidents family.\ `` treasury waste book p. 122 rg 217 dna. next section .. navigator ``

`` louis le bågue de presle duportail sir philadelphia 1 january 1783. honor inform letter 28th ult. duly laid congress gives particular pleasure agreeably orders 1 testify approbation reasons assigned detention europe beyond time fixed furlough. great satisfaction congress received information safe arrival america hope renewed exertions common cause crowned success. honor great respect sir c. ``

`` alexander hamilton george clinton sir philadelphia jany 1t. 1783. legislature shortly meet take liberty mention excellency appears great importance take affair vermont idea compromise massachusetts new hampshire propose states meeting commissioners purpose. little hope shall ever able engage congress act decision upon matter state ever recover part revolted territory upon plan interest two states mentioned least one. agree massachusetts new hampshire one agreement think meet support. 1 peace may shortly take place makes great importance pretensions affair speedily determined. honor yr. excellencys obed. hm. serv. a. hamilton ms found reprinted walton records vermont 3:288- 89. 1 belief congress would never capable bringing end vermont controversy see also new york delegates clinton december 9 hamilton john laurence december 12 1782. next section .. navigator ``

`` james madison 's notes debates wednesday jany. 1st. 1783 decison controversy cont. penna. reported. 1 communications made minister france concurred circumstances effacing impressions made mr. jay 's letter marbois 's inclosed. vote thanks ct. rochambeau passed unanimity cordiality afforded fresh proof resentment agst. france greatly subsided. 2 ``

`` james madison james madison sr. hond sir jany 1st. 1783 mr. fitzpatrick moment called notice seen b e ing desired let know family well. pleasure hearing mr. jefferson arrived days ago. mr. f. sets quickly barely time tell well inclose bundle newspapers able gather late news. negociations peace said going late commission mr. oswald authorises treat commisrs. 13 united states. mr. jefferson depart little time order give aid case season. insidiousness instability b. cabinet forbid us sanguine especially releif gibralter posterior oswald 's commission interests adjusted among belligerent parties extremely complicated. great affection yr. dutf. son j madison jr. ``

`` samuel osgood benjamin lincoln dear general. philadelphia jany. 1st. 1783. inform much labor trouble fatigue deputation set rhode island saturday left us returned probably go forward soon 1 reason virginia repealed act impost. however absolutely deny pleasing hope seeing boston winter. entirely prepared journey preparation cost two hundred dollrs. purchase horse saddle briddle articles cloathing without could readily conceive amounted sum. unfortunate affair either oblige dispose share bank leave place soon. however wish january 1 1782 mentioned. recd. weeks post secretary 2 account amount drafts caution make frequent direction council. must confess appears little extraordinary. gives pain least meet difficulty account order gave. case wish press board hard negociate boston short time write brother isaac osgood salem doubt able pretty punctually discharge post requested 3 case request inform. inclosed copy secretary 's letter answer thereto. 4 dont recollect foreign news importance since left us communicated tho loss know whereabouts respect time. prospect peace less flattering -- perhaps -- yet feel much happier see treaties signed -- think many considerations side elsewhere may prevent speedy peace. arrangement newhampshire rode island new jersey lines postponed first march next also three regiments pennsylvania. think radically wrong sorry differ opinion -- delegates n hampshire rhode island declared congress states would comply -- think know masstts. connectt. call 'd upon equally defect. compliment two states great partial expence. however done. 5 done another wrong thing baron steuben. referred motion financier take order 2,400 dollrs. favr. baron acct. pay. repealed former allowances extra pay subsistence forage waggons ca family ordered lieu thereof three hundred dollrs. per month. 6 right. however army content amen. committee army arrived yesterday. 7 coll brooks breakfasted morning. ca n't recollect wicked things done since departure. mr. gorham confined ten twelve days growing better. mr. lovell confined disagreeable turn feaver ague ca. one day dusk came chamber seemed strange condition doctr. present. jack insisted upon legs big could move. hands head body big could possibly stir. doctr. thot vapoury -- felt pulse find bad -- bantered purpose half hour taken violent fit -- nobody room first taken -- found middle floor january 1 1783 perhaps half minute seized. mr. gorhams boy mine seized prevent injuring -- jam 'd head floor kicked violently. two boys match. neighbourhood doctr soon rallied. came weak remained three four days seems getting little better. mentioned condition. two hours since new year commenced therefore time bid adieu s. osgood p.s. judges trenton determined unanimously favor pennsylvania. time post write brother salem. meet difficulty account draft -- shall glad know soon may make provision payment thereof. think judge wrote moderate decent letter secry. dictated feelings -- apprehend may think differently upon state facts. shall return month two sooner. wish happy yes thousand happy new years. jany. 8th. greaton dayton putnam brigrs general. 8 ``

`` oliver wolcott oliver wolcott jr. sir philadelpa. 1 janry. 1783. wrote last post. 1 nothing material since occurred except judgment court appointed determine controversy connecticut pennsylvania read congress unanimously decided connecticut right territory jurisdiction country dispute. reasons sentence assigned -- consequently judgment apply precedent deciding cases. hope pennsylvania quiet settlers claim connecticut wish stipulation nature entered previous tryal. january 2 1783 nothing material otherwise occurrd since last. shall probably soon better able judge wheather g britain seriously intends settle peace -- wheather designs insidious delusive. 2 pass post office dayly enquire every post letters mine. france remitted interest due states prior remember right last july. never suffer paragraphs letters printed. wolcott ``

`` david ramsay john eliot dear sir january 2d 1783 philada. much obliged last kind letter first december. right respect dr. warrens oration. one pronounced 1775 opinion best whole collection. 1 account give mr austin truly deplorable. pity bright sun set soon worse set cloud. 2 evacuation charlestown event though much desired yet authenticated. last southern post brought disagreeable accounts gen. green obliged retreat also properly ascertained. ask opinion subject dr whites performance. 3 read say puts ordination presbyterian footing. candid catholic worthy man excellent citizen. think probable plan adopted case churches differ forms worship. speaker mr gorham esteem congress reckoned man abilities integrity. mentioned nothing mr january 2 1783 burgess. 4 private opinion gain nothing applying congress. inconsistency soon departing resolution respecting british subjects would hold public view fickle unsteady body relaxed favor individual however deserving. present sense many members stronger evidence british subject produces attachment america fit would employed enemy. know nothing gentlemans character let ever good believe congress would break late resolution sake. peace established british subjects liberties coming america europeans. among freinds must take amiss embrace period. private sentiment many freinds america absolutely considered g. britain suspect freindship america independent allied france. last consider anchor former would nothing would remote manner hurt. papers inform negociations going new commission made empowering mr oswald treat states america. lord shelburne double character suspect sincerity. god grant may mistaken. greatest esteem regard real freind humble servt david ramsay ``

`` elias boudinot william livingston dr. sir philadelphia jany. 4th 1783 honor enclose letter excellency request honorable mr. jefferson,1 goes days europe. january 4 1783 afternoon recd. letter gentn. veracity newbern carolina informing falling 300 sail transports charles town five fathom hole gamier destroying military works town. expected would gone 14th ultimo. great regard excellency 's obedt humble servt elias boudinot ``

`` john rutledge abner nash dr. sir january 4 1783 send inclosed draught report respecting valuation land several states similar committee agreed -- request mr madison wd. pleased peruse suggest addition alteration may occur necessary proper may present report monday tuesday next. 1 also send english land-tax-act 2 may perhaps incline read see thing law incorperated resolve tho may suggest hints respective legislatures framing laws required. sir yr. obedt servt j. rutledge ``

`` john collins nathanael greene dear sir philadelphia january 5. 1783 brothers potawom 1 begin g last month inform well make doubt heard alteration happened familys moth january 6 1783 ers marrage death brothers wives. taken seat congress probale spring delegation eanded may proceed far charles town georgey. affairs settle messrs. miller codington sunbery georgey. bond upwards five hundred pound sterling protested bill one hundred twenty standing upwards seven years means hear know thing gentlemens situation information would kindly acknowledgd. doubtfull estates may hands government. sir great regard humbl servt. john collins ``

`` samuel wharton john cook sir philadelphia 5th january 1783 honorable house assembly yet determined whether increase present number men delaware regiment far delegates would wish informed honorable council assembly 's sentiments upon head order approve delegates may move congress suspend resolution 7th august obtain one similar 31st last month transcribed. 1 great respect sir honour 's obedient faithful servt. saml. wharton ``

`` elias boudinot lewis pintard dear sir philadelphia jany 6th. 1783 congratulations recd every thing comes january 6 1783 constantly great pleasure. letter mr morris delivered 1 think best begin business soon possible otherwise may blamed delay proceeded part way find satisfaction given desireable event takes place propriety resign -- manage allways finish business begun short time must dividing country districts neighbourhoods finishing one begin another. prices things ca designed sole judge. unaquainted prevent must judge evidence remedy would call two judges county allways assistance dare say would gladly attend -- generally agreed prices things different years county would wanted. say nothing mr. r design. news evacuation charles town give great credit. two letters eliz town part garrison arrived new york 3d instt. since last recd. two pacquets madeira via st. thomas 's broke open see enclosed. wrote via teneriffe hope meet speedy passage. must beg send melon seed mean let slaves. good per first opportunity send two card racks find. turn thing new wednesday add. kind love madam johnny ca remember worthy old friend coll ludlow. let paper tell remember pleasure. forget complimt. mr livingston family -- mr. dennis -- gentn. morris town. dr sir 's afftly. elias boudinot p.s. janry 7th. recd evening full acct evacuation charles town possession taken genl wayne -- congratulate hope prelude ny. paid days since 270 dollars mr. robertson name monies belonging mr c 's children -- please credit ``

`` david howell john carter. january 6 1783 1 every thing relating finance essentially concerns ranks people sent following extracts letters gentlemen public characters europe others like characters city read congress. extract letter mr. adams dated hague july 5 1782. 2 `` although obliged engage five millions guilders expect shall obtain sum long time. get million half christmas expect.\ `` extract letter another gentleman dated paris october 25 1782. 3 `` letter mr. adams dated hague september 29 following intelligence 'amidst innumerable crowd loans opened country many little success afraid would failed. however pleasure inform least one million half cash three millions livres aid operations finances. appears mr. adams well employed time holland beg please communicate extract mr. morris.\ `` two extracts letters mr. adams appears loan negociating holland failed contrary filled faster expected loan obtained 29th september expected christmas. reprinted providence gazette january 25 1783. 1 letter printed john carter publisher providence gazette heading `` extract letter gentleman philadelphia friend town dated jan. 6.\ `` recipient conjectured fact letter howell carter somewhat similar import published heading november 2 1782 issue gazette see howell carter october 16 1782 note 1. context howell 's efforts publicize john adams letters extracted document see jonathan arnold william greene december 18 james madison 's notes debates december 6 18 1782. 2 extract john adams letter robert r. livingston see pcc item 84 4:95 wharton diplomatic correspondence 5:594. 3 letter marquis de lafayette found september 29 letter john adams mentioned next sentence see lafayette papers idzerda 5:59- 60. next section .. navigator ``

`` david howell john carter. january 6 1783 order people large may enabled form proper idea reputation credit abroad thought proper january 6 1783 send following extracts letters dr. franklin read congress. 1 passy sept. 3 1782. affords much satisfaction find conduct congress approved hear speak see marks constantly growing regard us confidence us among sentiments desired. 2 passy august 12 1782. ranks nation appear good-humour us reputation rises throughout europe. 3 passy august 12 1782. superintendant finance. conduct activity address financier provider public exigencies states much admired praised good consequences evident particularly regard rising credit country value bills. 4 passy april 8 1782. public affairs go swimmingly holland. 5 although letters extracts taken read congress till 27th december last truly represent affairs time respective dates ought prevent us terrified measures extremity groundless apprehension foreign affairs ruinous condition. 6 reprinted providence gazette february 1 1783. 1 circumstances surrounding howell 's efforts make public benjamin franklin letters extracted document see preceding entry. 2 letter franklin robert r. livingston see pcc item 82 2:212 wharton diplomatic correspondence 5:682. 3 letter also directed secretary livingston. pcc item 82 2:205 ibid p. 655. 4 see morris papers ferguson 6:171. 5 ibid 4:548. 6 motion howell offered december 27 direct secretary foreign affairs transmit first second franklin extracts governor rhode island see jcc 23:832-33. next section .. navigator ``
